Commenting on these changes, Eric Schmidt said: We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. Larry said:`` Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google Inc. for the last decade. The results speak for themselves.
